name: Stella and Frank PEMPKOWSKI, Appellants, v. STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY
name_abbreviation: Pempkowski v. State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance

judges: NIGRO, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Stella and Frank PEMPKOWSKI, Appellants, v. STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
NIGRO, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
CAPPY, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Anthony J. Baratía, Jenkintown, for Stella and Frank Pempkowski.
James T. Moughan, Philadelphia, for State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Co.
casebody.head_matter:
693 A.2d 201
Stella and Frank PEMPKOWSKI, Appellants, v. STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 29, 1997.
Decided May 20, 1997.
Anthony J. Baratía, Jenkintown, for Stella and Frank Pempkowski.
James T. Moughan, Philadelphia, for State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Co.
